mapper.sql: SELECT A.* ,(SELECT MAX(FILE_ID) FROM TB_FILE WHERE PARNTS_DTA_ID=A.CMPY_ID AND UPLOAD_FILE_NM = 'cmpyImg') AS CMPY_FILE_ID FROM ( SELECT A.* ,(SELECT CMPY_ID FROM TB_CMPY WHERE USER_ID=A.REGT_ID) AS CMPY_ID ,(SELECT CMPY_NM FROM TB_CMPY WHERE USER_ID=A.REGT_ID) AS CMPY_NM ,(SELECT MAX(FILE_ID) FROM TB_FILE WHERE PARNTS_DTA_ID=A.PRODUCT_ID AND UPLOAD_FILE_NM = 'productImg[]') AS FILE_ID FROM TB_PRODUCT A ) A
mapper.select: SELECT 'pdt' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') || LPAD(NVL(Max(SUBSTR(PRODUCT_ID,17))+1,1),3,'0') AS PRODUCT_ID FROM TB_PRODUCT WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') = SUBSTR(PRODUCT_ID,4,14)
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO BLENDING.TB_PRODUCT tgt USING ( SELECT #{productId} AS PRODUCT_ID ,#{productRegStatus} AS PRODUCT_REG_STATUS ,#{productNm} AS PRODUCT_NM ,#{productRelDt} AS PRODUCT_REL_DT ,#{cateNm} AS CATE_NM ,#{certStatus} AS CERT_STATUS ,#{usp} AS USP ,#{productInfo} AS PRODUCT_INFO ,#{regtId} AS REGT_ID ,sysdate AS REGT_DT ,#{updtId} AS UPDT_ID ,sysdate AS UPDT_DT FROM DUAL ) src ON (tgt.PRODUCT_ID = src.PRODUCT_ID) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET PRODUCT_REG_STATUS = src.PRODUCT_REG_STATUS ,PRODUCT_NM = src.PRODUCT_NM ,PRODUCT_REL_DT = src.PRODUCT_REL_DT ,CERT_STATUS = src.CERT_STATUS ,CATE_NM = src.CATE_NM ,USP = src.USP ,PRODUCT_INFO = src.PRODUCT_INFO WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( PRODUCT_ID ,PRODUCT_REG_STATUS ,PRODUCT_NM ,PRODUCT_REL_DT ,CERT_STATUS ,CATE_NM ,USP ,PRODUCT_INFO ,REGT_ID ,REGT_DT ,UPDT_ID ,UPDT_DT ) VALUES( src.PRODUCT_ID ,src.PRODUCT_REG_STATUS ,src.PRODUCT_NM ,src.PRODUCT_REL_DT ,src.CERT_STATUS ,src.CATE_NM ,src.USP ,src.PRODUCT_INFO ,src.REGT_ID ,src.REGT_DT ,src.UPDT_ID ,src.UPDT_DT )
mapper.select: SELECT CATE_ID FROM TB_CATEGORY WHERE UPPER(TRIM(CATE_NM)) = UPPER(TRIM(#{cateNm}))
